gammaduwa pawathwana aaranchiya enne kapu mahaththayath ekkayi.game geyak gane awidina kapu mahaththaya gam maduwa pawath wime aanisanshe kiyamin paththini maniyange theda bala gamwasinta sihi karamin yanawa.gewalwala dewiyanta wenkarala thiyena wi ekathukaragena yana ekath kapu mahaththaya ekka ena golayinge rajakariyak.gewalwala ayatama kiyala para addara thiyena gekata wigonitika gennagena eewa karaththeka patola geniyanne maduwe rajakari patan gannakotamayi.wi walata amatharawa gam maduwata adharath kapu mahaththaya ekathu karanne gammaduwe aanishansa hatiyata ledaroga aduwima bawaboga aswanna wadiwima wage dewal gana minissunta kiyadena gamanuyi.boralugoda athale suduwalipatha ingurudaluwa ranathungoda pahalahewessa wage gamwalath awidala gam maduwata dayakathwaya ganna kapu mahaththaya amathaka kare na.oya gamwalasanchare iwara karala subha dawasaka gammaduwata kap situwima karanawa.sirisena paththini mahaththaya maha yathikawak karala hak pimbaala doragewala oowite kap hitonawa.me kap hituwillata issella eekata subha dawas nakath ehema balala eekata galapenawidiyata thamayi me katayuthu karanne.
